Go hello world with regex https://www.bustroker.com/notes/go-hello-world-with-regex/ Fri, 13 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 <<<<<<< HEAD
https://www.bustroker.com/notes/go-hello-world-with-regex/ FluxCD Image policy applies regex to select latest tag. FluxCD uses go regex, so this go app tests a regex. Create project # create go module go mod init atoss-regex # create main file touch main.go Code // main.go package main import ( "fmt" "regexp" ) func main() { // pattern := `^(?P<version>[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)$` pattern := `^(?P<version>[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+)$` // pattern := `^([0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+)$` tags := []string{ "v1.0.0", "0.0.51", "0.0.16", "2.1.0", "1.2.3", "v0.9.8", "1.0", "invalid", "1.
